definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="random">random</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="79" w="256">This should be applied to a global trigger "Player right-clicks block" not directly to the blocks right-click trigger as it will cause block placement cancelation.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="compare_mcblocks"><value name="a"><block type="blockstate_from_deps"></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:LightAlgaeCyanPoolTiles</field><comment pinned="false" h="49" w="184">This should be the waxed version of your block stage.</comment></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="compare_mcitems"><comment pinned="false" h="50" w="157">This will get the item in the players main-hand.</comment><value name="a"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">Items.SHEARS</field><comment pinned="false" h="35" w="136">Your wax-like item.</comment></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="65" w="257">This will run on server-side to make sure the particles and sound are on the right kind of side when they are run.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="world_data_isremote"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:random</field><comment pinned="false" h="64" w="206">This will set a random number between 1 and 3 to then assign a random pitch value.</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_random_int_between"><value name="min"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="max"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation elseif="1" else="1"></mutation><comment pinned="false" h="64" w="173">This randomizes the pitch sound. Same as when copper blocks get waxed.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:random</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:random</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.9</field></block></value></block></statement><value name="IF1"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:random</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO1"><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:random</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:random</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1.1</field></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="play_sound"><field name="sound">block.honey_block.break</field><field name="soundcategory">block</field><comment pinned="false" h="63" w="278">If the sound is not set on import use the "item.axe.waxe_off" for the same sound when wax removed from copper blocks.</comment><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:random</field></block></value><next><block type="spawn_particle_multi"><field name="particle">SPORE_BLOSSOM_AIR</field><comment pinned="false" h="66" w="252">If the particle resets use the WAX_OFF particle for the same particle as copper blocks when they are applied with wax.</comment><value name="count"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="dx"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="dy"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="dz"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="speed"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></statement><next><block type="item_damage"><comment pinned="false" h="64" w="122">Deals damage to the axe when the wax is removed.</comment><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><next><block type="spawn_gem"><field name="despawn">TRUE</field><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:AlgaeBall</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="pickUpDelay"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value><next><block type="block_replace"><field name="state">TRUE</field><field name="nbt">TRUE</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:PoolTilesCyan</field><comment pinned="true" h="65" w="179">This should be your regular version of the same stage that your waxed block is.</comment></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
